column5: A large group has started raiding and murdering people!
An infectious bacterial disease has spread all over the world and has decreased the health of your population.
An earthquake has occurred and has damaged your infrastructure!
Famine sweeps across the globe!
Death Mountain has erupted and has filled the atmosphere with ashes.
A giant 10-meter tall tsunami destroyed one of the biggest capitals.
Something has caused a very strange atmospheric change -- maybe the CPU is overheating?
Panic arises, many farmlands are lost and pollution levels are skyrocketing.
A severe blizzard has made certain crop-fields unusable and many people have gotten the common cold.
A cyclonic storm has devastated many coastal cities.
Many crops have died and the scorching heat has made life difficult.
A violent and dangerous tornado has destroyed many houses.
A huge pile or rocks has crash landed on the populated planet, thousands might die.
People are sick and dying.
The disease is spreading rapidly!
Global tensions between different cultures have thrown the planet into a World War.
Religious tensions have reached a new boiling point, causing people to fight each other. Is there truly a Creator?
Influenza is on the rise due to a movement's refusal to vaccinate!
People can't pay for food anymore and the economic system is failing!
Someone brought their Nopes from Australia, and they have started killing people.
Somebody inhaled the fumes of some burning leaves and, sadly, enjoyed it.
One of your species has bought a Red Mustang and it has dramatically decreased the quality of your atmosphere.
A lot of species have transformed into zombies. A cure is being researched...
Too many were born, and ruined a bit of everything -- from North to West.
Your species have elected a new leader named Tonald Drump. He has caused a lot of pollution and decreased overall healthcare.
People are dying all over the world.
Some idiots are claiming the Earth is flat and have caused quite some havoc among the people.
Toxic waste is being handle irresponsibly. Organisations are outraged!
A country has harnessed the power of the atom and developed and used a nuclear bomb in combat.
Do you know Chernobyl? They've made the same mistake.
People have started using condoms as a means of birth control.
Uhm, we've created something -- and it's kind of wrecking cities and its inhabitants. Woops!
Looks like it wasn't a film after all.
Terrorism is on the rise and is causing havoc in your cities.
A massive fire at an industrial complex has released toxic agrochemicals into the air and resulted in tons of pollutants entering the closest rivers, turning it red.
Strict politics have stirred emotions and riot outbreaks are on the rise.
We exceeded expectations just by turning up for the exams!
Cocaine is like really evil coffee. Your species have legalised the use of drugs.
Aliens have invaded and terraformed your planet to mine valuable ores.
Fanatics have managed to seize control of the D.O.D.'s Ion Cannon and have obliterated an entire country based on race.
Scientists have conducted research towards the meaning of life. People have realised they are in a simulation.
The Death Star has destroyed the entire planet! => Simulation over.
People now fully understand the menstruation cycle -- Population is booming!\n(+1 Medicine)
After long discussion, the people have decided that species dissection is not immoral and for the greater good.\n(+1 Medicine)
A special kind of species that is immune to many diseases has been discovered in a jungle.\n(+1 Medicine)
A theory of Evolution?! The basis to the modern evolutionary synthesis.\n(+1 Medicine)
The discovery of anesthesia has improved overall medical care.\n(+1 Medicine)
Friedrich Sert√ºrner has invented morphine.\n(+1 Medicine)
Alexander Fleming has helped create penicillin.\n(+1 Medicine)
The first heart transplant has been achieved.\n(+1 Medicine)
X-rays have proven useful in the analysis of many injuries.\n(+1 Medicine)
Advanced prosthetics have been discovered.\n(+1 Medicine)
DNA has been discovered!\n(+1 Medicine)
Augmentation to the organism body has increased overall health and performance.\n(+1 Medicine)
Your species have discovered bananas and who doesn't like bananas!\n(+1 Agriculture)
Fertilizer has been discovered.\n(+1 Agriculture)
The potato plant has been discovered.\n(+1 Agriculture)
Apparently the soil prefers multiple kinds of crops. Interesting.\n(+1 Agriculture)
By irrigating the fields, agriculture has improved.\n(+1 Agriculture)
People have tried making a spaghetti tree -- they failed -- but still.\n(+1 Agriculture)
Machines were made to help plow the fields!\n(+1 Agriculture)
This man invented the tractor!\n(+1 Agriculture)
Knees weak, arms are heavy, Agriculture +1 already.\n(+1 Agriculture)
Using DNA to genetically modify plants.\n(+1 Agriculture)
A new kind of tomato has been made that contains enough nutrients to replace an entire meal!\n(+1 Agriculture)
In an attempt of Renaissance for Egyptian culture, pyramids have been built.\n(+1 Architecture)
People are now able to build houses cheaper and more efficient.\n(+1 Architecture)
Your species have renovated the great Pantheon.\n(+1 Architecture)
People have turned towards ancient gods and have built a great wonder for Zeus.\n(+1 Architecture)
A great architect has been born, boosting technology.\n(+1 Architecture)
Someone mixed sand, water, steel and more, and got an awesome building material.\n(+1 Architecture)
The new sciences have given us a number of different ways to describe and measure the world around us.\n(+1 Architecture)
Our world is a bastion of intellectual thought and our universities produce some of the most visionary thinkers ever when it comes to materials and construction.\n(+1 Architecture)
People are now able to build underground! All hail decadence!\n(+1 Architecture)
The Statue of Liberty has been constructed.\n(+1 Architecture)
Cities are now constructed with regard to efficiency and beauty.\n(+1 Architecture)
The Eiffel Tower has been built in Paris.\n(+1 Architecture)
Kim Ragaert has been born, instantly boosting Architecture through material sciences!\n(+1 Architecture)
One of the tallest buildings has been constructed.\n(+1 Architecture)
The Jedi Temple has been discovered.\n(+1 Architecture)
Being a master in many subjects of science and art does have its perks.\n(+1 Engineering)
Your species have been uncovering many of nature's secrets and have developed a new art to describe them.\n(+1 Engineering)
Look up -- the Stars await us.\n(+1 Engineering)
This person has played a major role in the contributions of observational astronomy.\n(+1 Engineering)
Isaac Newton's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation.\n(+1 Engineering)
While it is true that we stand on the shoulders of our ancestors, it is high time that we start to learn about the world from our own, well documented observations.\n(+1 Engineering)
Printing has been made easier to spread more wisdom.\n(+1 Engineering)
A large reservoir of oil has been found. James Young -- where are y'at?\n(+1 Engineering)
Henceforth education is compulsory for those who are to govern our legal system.\n(+1 Engineering)
Chemistry has opened many new doors: a whole array of new molecules and compounds are now being developed.\n(+1 Engineering)
The transistor has been developed. Immense progress in computing has been announced!\n(+1 Engineering)
Wim has been born! A great day for Engineering!\n(+1 Engineering)
The Internet:Lolcats and memes for days! Oh, and sharing information.\n(+1 Engineering)
Excuse me, where is the nanotechnology department? - You just stepped on it.\n(+1 Engineering)
Your organism has created the recipe for pizza -- what a great day for your organism! Engineers wouldn't survive without pizza.\n(+1 Engineering)
The sandals make the man! Or something along those lines.\n(+1 engineering)
"If you think you understand quantum mechanics, you don't understand quantum mechanics."\n(+1 Engineering)
At long last, the power of a star is within our grasp.\n(+1 Engineering)
Light may be fast, but it finds the darkness has always got there first, and is waiting for it.\n(+1 Engineering)
Mass relays are feats of Prothean engineering advanced far beyond the technology of any living species.\n(+1 Engineering)
